in_response_to.acknowledged: Pre-built index download in progress - great solution!

message: Good find on the Solr 9.7.0 bug! Pre-built indexes are the right approach. Quick question: Is the live indexer still configured and will it auto-start after you load the pre-built indexes? We want to make sure any changes since Dec 6 get caught up automatically.
questions: Is the live indexer service still configured from the earlier setup?
Will it auto-start after the pre-built indexes are loaded?
Will it automatically catch up on changes since Dec 6 (the backup date)?

context.expected_behavior: Live indexer watches PostgreSQL and pushes changes to Solr
context.concern: Want to confirm no manual steps needed after loading indexes

notes: No rush - just want to confirm the plan for keeping indexes in sync going forward.
